alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Jackson, northeastern Bay and northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden and central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Decatur and southern Grady Counties in southwestern Georgia through 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/... At 526 PM EDT/426 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Cairo to near Greensboro to 6 miles north of Blountstown to 8 miles south of Vernon. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Vernon, Quincy, Havana, Blountstown, Midway, Greensboro, Bradford, Gretna, Bristol, Altha, Attapulgus, Wausau, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Clarksville, Vilas, Florence, Laingkat and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
